owner.username: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

title._content: Photographic postcard of a woman, possibly actress Marjorie Neil, and toy bear at a piano

description._content: This postcard has an inscription on the reverse that reads: '26.vii.ii / 72 Waterloo Rd, South Shore / Hope you are well also Beatie, Ms sends her love. Teddy Bear in photograph was given to her the other night. Kindest Regards, Yrs ACC.' Postcard is addressed to Mrs Kerr North Pier / Blackpool'. This image is part of an archive series consisting of photographs relating to the career of champion Australian swimmer, diver and vaudeville entertainer in Australia and the United Kingdom Beatrice Kerr. If reproduced or distributed, this image should be clearly attributed to the collection of the Australian National Maritime Museum; and not be used for any commercial or for-profit purposes without the permission of the museum. For more information see our Flickr Commons Rights Statement. The ANMM undertakes research and accepts public comments that enhance the information we hold about images in our collection. This record has been updated accordingly. Thank you for helping caption this important historical image. Object number ANMS1032[003] ANMM Collection Gift from Michael Williams
